content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 48-55)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (14.5, 8.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (14.5, 8.0) (status: FULL_OUTPUT)
- Steam engine at (17.5, 8.5) (status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- Small electric poles at (19.5, 9.5) and (17.5, 11.5)
- Partial water pipe connection from offshore pumps

### Secondary Boiler at position (14.5, 11.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (14.5, 11.0) (status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- No steam engine or proper connections

### New Boiler at position (0.5, -2.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (0.5, -2.0) (status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- No steam engine or proper connections

### Oil Processing Complex
Consists of:
- Oil refinery at (15.5, 15.5) (status: NO_POWER, recipe: BasicOilProcessing)
- Pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) (status: NO_POWER)
- Partial pipe network for crude oil (status: EMPTY)
- Missing power connections throughout

### Chemical Plant Complex at position (6.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Chemical plant (status: NO_POWER, recipe: sulfur)
- Storage tank at (3.5, 12.5)
- Small electric poles at (8.5, 10.5), (8.5, 13.5), and (7.5, 14.5)
- Missing petroleum gas input and power

### Water Pipe Network
Consists of:
- Two offshore pumps at (-9.5, -0.5) and (-9.5, -2.5)
- Extensive pipe network with multiple pipe groups:
  - Working water pipes (status: FULL_OUTPUT) centered at (-8.5, -2.5)
  - Empty pipe sections (status: EMPTY) throughout the map

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement Issues
- Repeated placement failures due to occupied tiles (-7.5, -2.5) and (13.5, 20.0)
- Clear target areas before placement attempts
- Verify terrain is suitable (not water or cliffs)

### Fluid Connection Problems
- Persistent offshore pump to boiler connection failures (positions: -9.5/-2.5 to 10.5/20.0)
- Ensure proper alignment between pump output and boiler input
- Verify no obstructions in pipe paths

### Entity Retrieval Errors
- Attempted to access non-existent steam engines
- Implement existence checks before entity retrieval
- Maintain inventory of placed entities

### Power System Issues
- Steam engines remain unconnected despite placement attempts
- Verify proper spacing (2 tiles between boiler and engine)
- Ensure all components face correct directions

### Inventory Insertion Failures
- Failed to insert coal into boilers
- Verify target entity can accept fuel before insertion
- Check burner inserter configurations

### Persistent Issues from Previous Report
- Placement distance problems (still occurring)
- Fluid system management (still occurring)
- Power grid connectivity (still occurring)

### New Issues
- Entity existence assumptions causing index errors
- Implement defensive programming for entity access
- Add validation for entity lists before access
